Interface ElementTextDelegate<E extends Element, B extends TypedBuilder<E,B>>

All Superinterfaces:
ElementTextMethods<E,B>, IsElement<E>, TypedBuilder<E,B>
public interface ElementTextDelegate<E extends Element, B extends TypedBuilder<E,B>> extends TypedBuilder<E,B>, ElementTextMethods<E,B>
Delegates all methods from ElementTextMethods to the element returned by textDelegate().

  • Method Summary
